    • Method Detail

      • Public Sub AddToScratchPad(bwt As BoardwalkTable, bwtScratchPadTable As BoardwalkTable, sPName As String, sPDiscription As String, vntColValue As Variant, vntMFA As Variant, vntMFE As Variant, vntBwtSearch As Variant, vntDropDown As Variant, vntFormula As Variant, sPUser As String, sPType As String)

        Public Sub AddToScratchPad(bwt As BoardwalkTable, bwtScratchPadTable As BoardwalkTable, sPName As String, sPDiscription As String, vntColValue As Variant, vntMFA As Variant, vntMFE As Variant, vntBwtSearch As Variant, vntDropDown As Variant, vntFormula As Variant, sPUser As String, sPType As String)
        Details:

        '---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        ' Procedure : AddToScratchPad
        ' Author : Sanghapal Bhowate
        ' Date : 7/06/2011
        ' Purpose : This subprocedure saves selected set of rows in the scratch pad cuboid under a given pattern name.
        ' This subprocedure identifies entire boardwalk data row(s) based on selection of limited cells within main cuboid.
        ' Then as per the prompted entries from the user interface, it creates the pattern in the scratch pad cuboid.
        ' Parameters:
        ' * Main boardwalk table--The main cuboid from which rows are to be saved in the scratch pad.
        ' * Scratch pad boardwalk table--The scratch pad cuboid where the pattern will be saved.
        ' * Pattern name--The name by which the pattern will be saved.
        ' * Pattern description--The content that describes the pattern.
        ' * Value column names array--An array that contains names of those columns for which the values are to be copied from main cuboid to scratch pad cuboid.
        ' * MFA column names array--An array that contains names of those columns for which single value per column will be prompted to user and will be populated for all rows while inserting the pattern.
        ' * MFE column names array--An array that contains names of those columns for which values must be prompted to user for each row in the pattern while insertion.
        ' * Boardwalk search column names array--An array that contains names of those columns for which boardwalk search functionality has been implemented.
        ' * Formula column names array--Value column names array--An array that contains names of those columns for which the formulae are to be copied from main cuboid to scratch pad cuboid.
        ' * Pattern user--The user who can access the pattern. This is blank when the pattern type is shared.
        ' * Pattern type--The type of the pattern being saved. Could be "shared" or "personal".
        '------------- --------------------------------------------------------------------------

      • Private Sub CopyData(rngSource As Range, rngTarget As Range)

        Private Sub CopyData(rngSource As Range, rngTarget As Range)
        Details:

        '---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        ' Procedure : CopyData
        ' Author : Siddhant Chothe
        ' Date : 2/25/2011
        ' Purpose : Copy the data from source range to target range.
        ' Parameters:
        ' * Source range--Indicating the source range from where data for all columns will get copied
        ' * Target range--Indicating the target range where the data for corresponding columns will get pasted.
        '------------- --------------------------------------------------------------------------

      • Private Sub CopyDataOnBoardwalkColumns(bwtSource As BoardwalkTable, bwtTarget As BoardwalkTable, rngSource As Range, rngTarget As Range, vntColumnNames As Variant)

        Private Sub CopyDataOnBoardwalkColumns(bwtSource As BoardwalkTable, bwtTarget As BoardwalkTable, rngSource As Range, rngTarget As Range, vntColumnNames As Variant)
        Details:

        '---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        ' Procedure : CopyDataOnBoardwalkColumns
        ' Author : Sanghapal Bhowate
        ' Date : 7/04/2011
        ' Purpose : This subprocedure performs a columnwise copy of values from source range within a boardwalk table to target range within another boardwalk table.
        ' This method looks for the columns in the source cuboid and performs an intersect of column range with the sub range.
        ' Then copies the values from this intersected range .
        ' It retrieves the target range in similar fassion and performs a copy from source intersected column range to target intersected column range.
        ' Note that the method assumes that the column names are same in both the source and target cuboids.
        ' Parameters:
        ' * Source boardwalk table--The source cuboid from which values are to be copied.
        ' * Target boardwalk table--The target cuboid where the values are to be pasted.
        ' * Source range--The range (could be with multiple columns and rows) which forms the subset of the source cuboid.
        ' * Target range--The range (could be with multiple columns and rows) which forms the subset of the target cuboid.
        ' * Column names array--An array that contains column names found in both the ranges.
        '------------- --------------------------------------------------------------------------

      • Private Sub CopyDropDownListOnBoardwalkTable(bwtSource As BoardwalkTable, bwtTarget As BoardwalkTable, rngSource As Range, rngTarget As Range, vntColumnNames As Variant)

        Private Sub CopyDropDownListOnBoardwalkTable(bwtSource As BoardwalkTable, bwtTarget As BoardwalkTable, rngSource As Range, rngTarget As Range, vntColumnNames As Variant)
        Details:

        '---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        ' Procedure : CopyDropDownListOnBoardwalkTable
        ' Author : Sanghapal Bhowate
        ' Date : 7/29/2011
        ' Purpose : This subprocedure performs a columnwise copy of drop-down lists from source range within a boardwalk table to target range within another boardwalk table.
        ' This method looks for the columns in the source cuboid and performs an intersect of column range with the sub range.
        ' Then copies the drop-down lists from this intersected range .
        ' It retrieves the target range in similar fassion and performs a copy from source intersected column range to target intersected column range.
        ' Note that the method assumes that the column names are same in both the source and target cuboids.
        ' Parameters:
        ' * Source boardwalk table--The source cuboid from which drop-down lists or data validations are to be copied.
        ' * Target boardwalk table--The target cuboid where the drop-down lists or data validations are to be pasted.
        ' * Source range--The range (could be with multiple columns and rows) which forms the subset of the source cuboid.
        ' * Target range--The range (could be with multiple columns and rows) which forms the subset of the target cuboid.
        ' * Column names array--An array that contains column names found in both the ranges.
        '------------- --------------------------------------------------------------------------

        ' * Source range--Indicating the source range from where formula for all columns will get copied
        ' * Target range--Indicating the target range where the formula for corresponding columns will get pasted.
        '------------- --------------------------------------------------------------------------

      • Private Sub CopyFormulaOnBoardwalkColumns(bwtSource As BoardwalkTable, bwtTarget As BoardwalkTable, rngSource As Range, rngTarget As Range, vntColumnNames As Variant)

        Private Sub CopyFormulaOnBoardwalkColumns(bwtSource As BoardwalkTable, bwtTarget As BoardwalkTable, rngSource As Range, rngTarget As Range, vntColumnNames As Variant)
        Details:

        '---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        ' Procedure : CopyFormulaOnBoardwalkColumns
        ' Author : Sanghapal Bhowate
        ' Date : 7/04/2011
        ' Purpose : This subprocedure performs a columnwise copy of formulae from source range within a boardwalk table to target range within another boardwalk table.
        ' This method looks for the columns in the source cuboid and performs an intersect of column range with the sub range.
        ' Then copies the formulae from this intersected range .
        ' It retrieves the target range in similar fassion and performs a copy from source intersected column range to target intersected column range.
        ' Note that the method assumes that the column names are same in both the source and target cuboids.
        ' Parameters:
        ' * Source boardwalk table--The source cuboid from which formulae are to be copied.
        ' * Target boardwalk table--The target cuboid where the formulae are to be pasted.
        ' * Source range--The range (could be with multiple columns and rows) which forms the subset of the source cuboid.
        ' * Target range--The range (could be with multiple columns and rows) which forms the subset of the target cuboid.
        ' * Column names array--An array that contains column names found in both the ranges.
        '------------- --------------------------------------------------------------------------

      • Private Sub CopyValidationLists(rngSource As Range, rngTarget As Range)

        ' Purpose : Copy the drop-down list from source range to target range.
        ' Parameters:
        ' * Source range--Indicating the source range from where drop-down list for all columns will get copied
        ' * Target range--Indicating the target range where the drop-down list for corresponding columns will get pasted.
        '------------- --------------------------------------------------------------------------

      • Private Sub FillMFAValues(bwtMain As BoardwalkTable, rngInsertedRows As Range, vntMFAColumnNames As Variant, colMFAValues As Collection)

        Private Sub FillMFAValues(bwtMain As BoardwalkTable, rngInsertedRows As Range, vntMFAColumnNames As Variant, colMFAValues As Collection)
        Details:

        '---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        ' Procedure : FillMFAValues
        ' Author : Sanghapal Bhowate
        ' Date : 7/09/2011
        ' Purpose : This subprocedure populates the Mandetory For All columns with the values passed from the collection.
        ' Parameters:
        ' * Boardwalk table--The main cuboid in which the inserted rows are to be populated.
        ' * Inserted row range--The range of rows that have been inserted.
        ' * Columnnames array--An array that contains MFA column names.
        ' * Column values collection--The collection that contains MFA column name as key and corresponding value.
        '------------- --------------------------------------------------------------------------

      • Private Sub FillMFEValues(bwtMain As BoardwalkTable, rngInsertedRows As Range, vntMFEColumnNames As Variant, colMFEValues As Collection)

        Private Sub FillMFEValues(bwtMain As BoardwalkTable, rngInsertedRows As Range, vntMFEColumnNames As Variant, colMFEValues As Collection)
        Details:

        '---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        ' Procedure : FillMFEValues
        ' Author : Siddhant Chothe
        ' Date : 7/09/2011
        ' Purpose : This subprocedure populates the Mandetory For Each columns with the values passed from the collection.
        ' Parameters:
        ' * Boardwalk table--The main cuboid in which the inserted rows are to be populated.
        ' * Inserted row range--The range of rows that have been inserted.
        ' * Columnnames array--An array that contains MFE column names.
        ' * Column values collection--The collection that contains MFE column name as key and array of values as value.
        ' Note that the number of values for each MFE column must match the the number of rows in inserted row range.
        '------------- --------------------------------------------------------------------------

      • Private Function GetColumnListOnPatternName(sBwtScratchPad As String, sPName As String, sColumnName As String) As Variant

        Private Function GetColumnListOnPatternName(sBwtScratchPad As String, sPName As String, sColumnName As String) As Variant
        Details:

        '---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        ' Procedure : GetColumnListOnPatternName
        ' Author : Sanghapal Bhowate
        ' Date : 7/09/2011
        ' Purpose : This function gets the column list from the scratch pad rule table.
        ' For this, it accepts the column name of the scratch pad rule table from where the column list is to be retrieved.
        ' The name is of that column that contains either of the following values:
        ' -Comma separated value column list
        ' -Comma separated MFA column list
        ' -Comma separated MFE column list
        ' -Comma separated boardwalk search column list
        ' -Comma separated formula column list
        ' Parameters:
        ' * Scratch pad name--The string indicating the name of the scratch pad table.
        ' * Pattern name--The name of pattern of which the rule row range is to be looked for.
        ' * Column name--The name of column from which the column list is to be retrieved.
        ' Must be one of the constants defined in the ScratchPadManager module.
        ' Returns: Variant
        ' * Column names array--The array that contains column names of those columns that are to be looked for in scratch pad as well as main cuboid.
        '------------- --------------------------------------------------------------------------

      • Private Function GetInsertSequence(sBwtMain As String, sBwtScratchPad As String) As String

        Private Function GetInsertSequence(sBwtMain As String, sBwtScratchPad As String) As String
        Details:

        '---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        ' Procedure : GetInsertSequence
        ' Author : Sanghapal Bhowate
        ' Date : 7/09/2011
        ' Purpose : This function gets the insert sequence from the cuboid association table.
        ' For this, it accepts the main cuboid name and the corresponding scratch pad cuboid name.
        ' Parameters:
        ' * Main cuboid name--The name of the main cuboid on which the insert will occur.
        ' * Scratch pad cuboid name--The name of the scratch pad cuboid from where the patterns will be inserted.
        ' Returns: String
        ' * Insert sequence--The string denoting the insert sequence. Could be in format:-
        ' -"Position:" where is any of the values "Top","Cursor","Bottom"
        ' -"Sort: [, , ]" where the keysmentioned cannot exceed 3 as excel sort function does not support more than 3 keys.
        '------------- --------------------------------------------------------------------------

      • Private Function GetPatternRows(bwt As BoardwalkTable, bwtScratchPad As BoardwalkTable, sPName As String) As Range

        Private Function GetPatternRows(bwt As BoardwalkTable, bwtScratchPad As BoardwalkTable, sPName As String) As Range
        Details:

        '---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        ' Procedure : GetPatternRows
        ' Author : Sanghapal Bhowate
        ' Date : 6/28/2011
        ' Purpose : This function Gets the pattern rows from scratch pad cuboid provided the pattern name.
        ' The function collects the columns from the main boardwalk table excluding the BWID column.
        ' Then gets the corresponding column range based on these columns from the pattern retrieved.
        ' Hence it doesnot return BWID, Pattern name, pattern type and pattern user columns in the pattern range.
        ' Parameters:
        ' * Main boardwalk table--The main boardwalk table associated with the scratch pad cuboid.
        ' * Scratch pad boardwalk table--The scratch pad boardwalk table.
        ' Returns: Range
        ' * --
        '------------- --------------------------------------------------------------------------

      • Private Function GetPatternRule(bwtScratchPadRule As BoardwalkTable, sPName As String, sSPName As String) As Range

        Private Function GetPatternRule(bwtScratchPadRule As BoardwalkTable, sPName As String, sSPName As String) As Range
        Details:

        '--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        ' Procedure : GetPatternRule
        ' Author : Sanghapal Bhowate
        ' Date : 6/30/2011
        ' Purpose : This function gets the filtered rule from scratch pad rule table.
        ' The filteration is carried out on scratchpad name and pattern name.
        ' Parameters:
        ' * Boardwalk table--The boardwalk table that contains the scratch pad rules.
        ' * Pattern name--The name of the pattern to look for.
        ' * Scratch pad name--The name scratch pad boardwalk table that contains the patterns.
        ' Returns: Range
        ' * Row range--The range of rows that comprise a single scratch pad rule.
        '------------- --------------------------------------------------------------------------

      • Private Function GetUniqueValueCollectionFromString(sValues As String, Optional bIgnoreCase As Boolean = True) As Collection

        Private Function GetUniqueValueCollectionFromString(sValues As String, Optional bIgnoreCase As Boolean = True) As Collection
        Details:

        '---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        ' Procedure : GetUniqueValueCollectionFromString
        ' Author : Nitin Dhaware
        ' Date : 6/2/2011
        ' Purpose : This function gets the unique values in a collection given comma separated strings.
        ' Parameters:
        ' * Comma separated values--From which uniqueness is to be checked.
        ' * Optional ignore case flag--When true, case sensetive uniqueness is checked.
        ' That is, both "abc" and "Abc" will be returned in the collection.
        ' When false, case insensetive uniqueness is considered.
        ' That is, Either "abc" or "Abc" will be returned in the collection and other will be skipped.
        ' Returns: Collection
        ' * Collection of strings--With the unique values contained in the range.
        '------------- --------------------------------------------------------------------------

      • Private Function InsertBlankPattern(bwt As BoardwalkTable, bwtScratchPad As BoardwalkTable, sPName As String, sPType As String, sPUser As String, iRowCount As Integer) As Range

        Private Function InsertBlankPattern(bwt As BoardwalkTable, bwtScratchPad As BoardwalkTable, sPName As String, sPType As String, sPUser As String, iRowCount As Integer) As Range
        Details:

        '---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        ' Procedure : InsertBlankPattern
        ' Author : Sandhya Murkute
        ' Date : 6/29/2011
        ' Purpose : This function inserts a blank pattern in the scratch pad boardwalk table.
        ' It also fills the corresponding range with details like Pattern Name, Pattern User and Pattern Type.
        ' It then gets the inserted pattern range that contains only those columns that match the main boardwalk table.
        ' Parameters:
        ' * Main boardwalk table--The main boardwalk table which actsas the the source of pattern to be created.
        ' The boardwalk table is accepted to match the columns with scratch pad.
        ' * Scratch pad boardwalk table-- The boardwalk table in which the pattern is to be inserted.
        ' * Pattern name--The name of the pattern to be inserted.
        ' * Patttern type--The type of the pattern ("shared" or "personal").
        ' * Pattern user--This is provided only when the pattern type is "personal".
        ' * Number of rows--The number of rows that should be inserted.
        ' Returns: Range
        ' * Row range-- The row range that contains those columns that match the columns of the main boardwalk table. This excludes the BWID, pattern name, pattern type and pattern user.
        '------------- --------------------------------------------------------------------------

      • Public Sub InsertFromScratchPad(bwt As BoardwalkTable, bwtScratchPad As BoardwalkTable, sPName As String, colMFAValue As Collection, colMFEValue As Collection)

        Public Sub InsertFromScratchPad(bwt As BoardwalkTable, bwtScratchPad As BoardwalkTable, sPName As String, colMFAValue As Collection, colMFEValue As Collection)
        Details:

        '---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        ' Procedure : InsertFromScratchPad
        ' Author : Sanghapal Bhowate and updated by Nitin Dhaware
        ' Date : 7/15/2011
        ' Purpose : This subprocedure inserts a pattern from scratch pad cuboid into the main cuboid.
        ' Parameters:
        ' * Main boardwalk table--The main cuboid in which the pattern is to be inserted.
        ' * Scratch pad boardwalk table--The scratch pad cuboid from which the pattern will be read.
        ' * Pattern name--The name of pattern to be inserted.
        ' * MFA column values collection--The collection that contains MFA column name as key and corresponding value.
        ' MFA stands for Mandetory For All.
        ' It implies that the value accepted for a column will be populated for all rows in the inserted pattern.
        ' * MFE column values collection--The collection that contains MFE column name as key and array of values as value.
        ' MFE stands for Mandetory For Each.
        ' It implies that the array of values accepted for a column will be populated for each rows in inserted pattern.
        ' Note that the number of values for each MFE column must match the the number of rows in inserted row range.
        '------------- --------------------------------------------------------------------------

      • Private Function InsertScratchPadRule(sSPTblName As String, sPName As String, sPDesc As String, vntValueColumn As Variant, vntMFACol As Variant, vntMFECol As Variant, vntFormulaColumns As Variant, vntDropDownColumns As Variant, vntBWSearchColumns As Variant) As Range

        Private Function InsertScratchPadRule(sSPTblName As String, sPName As String, sPDesc As String, vntValueColumn As Variant, vntMFACol As Variant, vntMFECol As Variant, vntFormulaColumns As Variant, vntDropDownColumns As Variant, vntBWSearchColumns As Variant) As Range
        Details:

        '---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        ' Procedure : InsertScratchPadRule
        ' Author : Sandhya Murkute
        ' Date : 7/5/2011
        ' Purpose : This function inserts a scratch pad rule in the scratch pad rule boardwalk table and returns the inserted row range.
        ' Parameters:
        ' * Scratch pad name--The name of the scratch pad cuboid that contains the patterns.
        ' * Pattern name--The name of the pattern that is getting added.
        ' * Pattern description--The content that describes the pattern.
        ' * Value columns array--The array that contains names of columns of which values are to be copied.
        ' * Mandetory for all columns array--The array that contains the names of those columns for which user must be prompted while inserting patterns from scratch pad cuboid.
        ' The values for these columns will be prompted only once and filled for all rows inserted from pattern.
        ' * Mandetory for each columns array--The array that contains the names of those columns for which user must be prompted while inserting patterns from scratch pad cuboid.
        ' The values for these columns will be prompted for each row in the inserted pattern .
        ' * Formula columns array--The array that contains the column names for which the formula will get copied.
        ' * Boardwalk search columns array--The array that contains column names that have boardwalk search implemented.
        ' Returns: Range
        ' * Row range--The range of the row inserted in the scratch pad rule cuboid.
        '------------- --------------------------------------------------------------------------
